title: Magic Quiver
summaries: The Magic Quiver is a Hardmode accessory that boosts arrows and Stakes. It is dropped with a 1.25*1/80 (1.25%) chance from Skeleton Archers in the Cavern layer.
It grants the following boosts to arrows and Stakes:

• +10% damage
  • +100% velocity (does not affect Jester's, Ichor, and Venom Arrows, or Stakes)
  • +20% chance not to consume the ammo
It also affects the knockback of some arrow- and Stake-firing weapons by between around âˆ’40% and +9%; see notes.

Extra arrow velocity works by setting the arrow's extra updates value to 1. This does not affect Jester's Arrows, Ichor Arrows, Venom Arrows, or Stakes, as they already have an extra updates value of 1 (or greater).
